title: Singapore tells Facebook to correct post under new fake news law
text: Singapore ordered blogger Alex Tan on Thursday to correct a post on the Facebook page of a blog called the States Times Review that carried accusations of election rigging.

title: Instagram And Facebook Hit By Thanksgiving Outages
text: The Instagram, Facebook and Messenger apps were temporarily down for some users on Thanksgiving.

title: Facebook, Instagram, and Messenger are down for many around the world
text: If you’re having issues with various Facebook -owned services this morning, you’re very much not alone.

title: Facebook and Instagram are down
text: Facebook’s family of apps experienced a ‘major outage’ Thursday.

title: Instagram and Facebook are experiencing outages on Thanksgiving
text: Facebook and Instagram are experiencing outages on Thursday, leaving some users in the United States unable to post photos or answer messages on Thanksgiving.

title: Facebook Acquires Beat Games in Virtual Reality Content Push
text: The tech giant is committed to preserving the studio's independence, but we've heard that one before.
